reviewText: Very good instructor who makes abstract material easily accessible to all.
Bought it for my son who is majoring in physics in college and he is very happy with the depth of the course!
I bought this hoping it would help with the difficult concepts of physics. My son said the professor is annoying after the first five lessons. I do not think he will finish the videos.
Excellent all the way around. I would buy from them again. Very satisfied overall.

This is really much better than I expected.  Prof Wolfson does a great job in presenting basic concepts in physics with a lot of demos.  I didn't see it all but what I did see made me want to see more.  Mainly wanted to see the section on Thermodynamics and that was very clear.  He is a very good speaker.  I recommend it but wish that it was cheaper or that you could buy it in sections.
My husband loves these DVDs and the professor on this one is very good; he is so pleased with the amount of lessons on these DVDs.
